nodes.text: Mastigophorous was a city that was located on the planet Drall, on the northwest coast of the Boiling Sea.

The city of Mastigophorous was a domed city on the surface of Drall. The largest of the surface dwellings, Mastigophorous served as the center of society, politics, and culture for the Drall people. As diverse and exciting as Coronet City or Tyrena, Mastigophorous was able to keep its citizens engaged civically, and create a sense of community typically found in small rural communities.
The city combined some Selonian marble, ferrocrete, transparisteel, and gratenite to form a series of elevated roadways, maglev lines, and public plazas that covered a hundred square kilometers.
